from sys_log where account_ = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATE_FORMAT(operation_time_, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and type_key_ = 4 and result_ = 0
